mapper.sql: id, datetime, level, message, user_id, user_name, ip, invocation
mapper.insert:
insert into t_log
id, `datetime`,
`level`,
`message`,
`user_id`,
`user_name`,
`ip`,
`invocation`,
`args`,
`return`,
f_next_id('t_log'), now(),

#{userName,jdbcType=CHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_log
datetime = #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invocation = #{invocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
args = #{args,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
return = #{return,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
